flawed_nl_solution:
Sylvia got 50/5 = <<50/5=10>>10 incorrect answers.
This means she got 50 - 10 = <<50-10=35>>35 correct answers.
Sergio got 50 - 4 = <<50-4=46>>46 correct answers.
So, Sergio got 46 - 35 = <<46-35=11>>11 more correct answers than Sylvia.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 35. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
